title: Nail Polish

adjectives: Having an air of allure, romance and excitement
Having glamour; having an air of romance and excitement.
verbs: Care for (one's hand) by cutting and shaping the nails, etc.
To take care of the hands and fingernails.
Apply paint to; coat with paint
To fill a portion of a drawing with paint (color or a pattern).
nouns: Cosmetic beauty treatment for the fingernails and hands
Cosmetic treatment for the fingernails.
A manicure is a cosmetic beauty treatment for the fingernails and hands performed at home or in a nail salon.
Cosmetic treatment of the hands and fingernails.
A cosmetic treatment for the fingernails
Professional care for the hands and fingernails
One of the long extremities of the hand, sometimes excluding the thumb.
A part of the hand
One of the long extremities of the hand that is used for gripping objects.
Extremity of the hand.
Any of the terminal members of the hand (sometimes excepting the thumb)
Organ of manipulation and sensation found in the hands of humans and other primates
A finger is a limb of the human body and a type of digit, an organ of manipulation and sensation found in the hands of humans and other primates.
A preparation, such as powder or a skin cream, designed to beautify the body by direct application.
A toiletry designed to beautify the body
Popular trends.
Fashion refers to styles of dress that are popular in a culture at any given time.

Term for a popular style or practice in clothing, make-up, furniture, etc.

A prevailing mode of expression, e.g., clothing
Young female human
A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A young woman
A young girl.

A young female; miss.

Beauty is a characteristic of a person, place, object or idea that provides a perceptual experience of pleasure, meaning or satisfaction.
Characteristic of a person, animal, place, object, or idea
An outstanding example of its kind
A cosmetic lacquer applied to the fingernails or toenails.
A solvent used to remove nail polish, usually mostly acetone.
A lacquer available in many colors that is applied to the nails of the fingers or toes and serves as decoration, but also as protection for the nails.
A cosmetic lacquer applied to the fingernails or toenails
Nail polish is a lacquer that can be applied to the human fingernails or toenails to decorate and protect the nail plate.
A cosmetic lacquer that dries quickly and that is applied to the nails to color them or make them shiny

description:
Colored nail polish being applied to finger nails, often used to display an air of nonchalance or indifference.

Shown as red, pink or purple nail polish on most platforms, the color rarely changes the meaning of this emoji. Previously displayed as a single bottle of nail polish on Android and on Windows.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the nail polish emoji showcases a vibrant, glossy bottle with a rich, opaque liquid spilling slightly from its tip, rendered with Apple's signature 3D shading and smooth gradients. The bottle's rounded form and the reflective quality of the polish itself create a luxurious and appealing aesthetic. This emoji is commonly used to express a love for beauty, fashion, self-care, or to indicate that one is getting their nails done. Its bright, cheerful presentation on Apple devices makes it a popular choice for adding a touch of glamour or personal style to messages.
